net.sourceforge.JDash
Class Startup

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.JDash.Startup

public class Startup
extends java.lang.Object

This is a simple bootstrap class to kick off the JDash frame. Or to kick off the configuration editor.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String CONFIG_FLAG
          This is the command line argument to start the configuration window

public static final java.lang.String CONFIG_FLAG

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

createSkinFactory

public SkinFactory createSkinFactory()
                              throws java.lang.Exception
This method will return the skin factory instance that was created as a result of the confgiuration.

Returns:
the one and only skin factory
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

showException

public static void showException(java.lang.Exception e,
                                 boolean fatal)
A static show exception method. If a frame exists, then it will be set as the owner of the message box, if not, then the dialog will be poped by itself.

Parameters:
e - IN - the exception to show the error for.
fatal - IN - if true, then the system will exit after the message is displayed.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Startup a new instance of JDash.

Parameters:
args - IN - the startup parameters. At present, the only support argument is "-config"
